sentences.sentence: They were unflinchingly loyal to their friends.
sentences.translation: 他们对朋友不变的忠诚。

sentences.sentence: He held out his hand unflinchingly for the cane.
sentences.translation: 他毫不畏缩地伸出手去挨藤条打。

sentences.sentence: They went to their death unflinchingly, worthy of the title of heroes.
sentences.translation: 慷慨赴死，从容就义，他们当之无愧。
